channel.title: Error. Help please
channel.description:
Hi. I have 1 error, and I need some help.
[code]NPCHandler.java:775: illegal start of expression public int GetNpcKiller(int NPCID) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2007, 01:56:09 PM[/size][hr]anyone? I really need help...

server.itemHandler.DropItemCount = 0;
println("! Notify item resterting !");
}
}
break;
}
}
IsDropping = false;
}
}
}

public int GetNpcKiller(int NPCID) {
	int Killer = 0;
	int Count = 0;
	for (int i = 1; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
		if (Killer == 0) {
			Killer = i;
			Count = 1;
		} else {
			if (npcs[NPCID].Killing[i] > npcs[NPCID].Killing[Killer])

{
Killer = i;
Count = 1;
} else if (npcs[NPCID].Killing[i] == npcs[NPCID].Killing

[Killer]) {
Count++;
}
}
}
if (Count > 1 && npcs[NPCID].Killing[npcs[NPCID].StartKilling] == npcs[NPCID].Killing[Killer]) {
Killer = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;

item.title: Error. Help please
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Shed Blood Shed
item.description:
@Blood_Shed wrote:

well, I found where the error is… I don’t know what to fix though… Here is a clip of my NPCHandler.java…

					if (i == Maxi) {
						if (server.itemHandler.DropItemCount >= 

(server.itemHandler.MaxDropItems + 1)) {
							server.itemHandler.DropItemCount 

= 0;
							println("! Notify item resterting 

!");
						}
					}
					break;
				}
			}
			IsDropping = false;
		}
	}
}

	public int GetNpcKiller(int NPCID) {
		int Killer = 0;
		int Count = 0;
		for (int i = 1; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
			if (Killer == 0) {
				Killer = i;
				Count = 1;
			} else {
				if (npcs[NPCID].Killing[i] > npcs[NPCID].Killing[Killer]) 

{
					Killer = i;
					Count = 1;
				} else if (npcs[NPCID].Killing[i] == npcs[NPCID].Killing

[Killer]) {
					Count++;
				}
			}
		}
		if (Count > 1 && npcs[NPCID].Killing[npcs[NPCID].StartKilling] == npcs

[NPCID].Killing[Killer]) {
			Killer = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
		}
		return Killer;
	}

Any Ideas?
